alert.note: Alert for Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:50PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morrill County through 1030 PM MDT... At 949 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, or 24 miles southwest of Alliance, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bridgeport State Recreation Area around 955 PM MDT. Bridgeport and Northport around 1000 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
